text: Kunstforum International is a bi-monthly magazine for contemporary art. Every issue has about 350 pages with a first part on a specific theme and in-depth articles on contemporary art, a part with interviews with artists and art professionals, a part with exhibition reviews, and essays. ==History== The magazine was established in 1973 in Cologne by Dieter Bechtloff and published in bookform. ==References== == External links == * Category:1973 establishments in West Germany Category:Bi-monthly magazines published in Germany Category:Contemporary art magazines Category:German-language magazines Category:Magazines established in 1973 Category:Mass media in Cologne Category:Visual arts magazines published in Germany
title: Kunstforum International
